alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 9:54AM EST until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Dillon, Horry and Marion Counties. Waccamaw River At Conway affecting Horry County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Little Pee Dee River At Galivants Ferry affecting Horry and Marion Counties. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Little Pee Dee River...including Galivants Ferry...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Waccamaw River...including Freeland, Above Conway, Conway, Aiw At old Hwy 544 At Socastee, Longs...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Pee Dee River at Galivants Ferry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood waters will continue to rise in the Fork Retch community located near Nichols. Flood waters will begin to affect some homes at Fork Retch. Swampland flooding will increase. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Thursday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.3 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by late tonight.
